title: Taking Office
description: Mr. Cooper is a rich and powerful business man. But he's about to learn his power means nothing in the face of his erotic, hypnotic secretary. When she gets through with him he will be a changed man.This short hypnotic monologue is for all those men who fantasize about giving in to a woman, all those woman who fantasize about taking control of a man and anyone who wants to experience the joys of erotic hypnosis from either side.Contains adult themes. For those 18 years of age and older. All characters 18+
author: Lucian Carter
